name: Dodge the Creeps (Broskit)
description:
-- Short Description --

First game made using a Godot tutorial. Not too proud as I followed a tutorial to make it. But I will upload my own original game soon! I also want to let you know that it gets harder over time. The difficulty also doesn't reset as it's a simple bug I don't feel like fixing.

-- Note --

First game and not much gameplay but I will release a new game soon that is made completely by me and a lot more gameplay. However, this was important for me learning how to use Godot. Enjoy!
